## letterHeader() function

convert a number to a letter header `0 -> A` `1 -> B` `26 -> BA` `27 -> BB` etc..

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function letterHeader(n: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | <code>number</code> | natural number to convert to letter header |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
